Background Information.question: What is your name, age, gender and contact information?
Background Information.expected_answer:
Name: [User's Name]
Age: [User's Age]
Gender: [User's Gender]
Contact Information: [User's Contact Info]

Background Information.question: Do you have any family members or significant others?
Background Information.expected_answer: Relevant Family Members/Significant Others: [Mentioned or Not Mentioned]

Reasons for Seeking Therapy.question: Why did you decide to seek therapy at this time?
Reasons for Seeking Therapy.expected_answer: Reason for Seeking Therapy: [User's Stated Reasons]

Reasons for Seeking Therapy.question: What do you hope to get out of this i.e what are the changes you are hoping to see?

Mental Health History.question: Have you ever been diagnosed with a mental health disorder? If so, what was the diagnosis?
Mental Health History.expected_answer:
Diagnosed Mental Health Disorder: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Specific Diagnosis]

Mental Health History.question: Have you received any previous mental health treatments? If so, what were they?
Mental Health History.expected_answer:
Previous Mental Health Treatment: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Therapy, Medication, Hospitalization, etc.]

Mental Health History.question: Do you have a family history of mental health issues?
Mental Health History.expected_answer:
Family History of Mental Health Issues: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Specific Conditions & Family Members]

Trauma and Adverse Experiences.question: Have you experienced any traumatic events or adverse experiences in your life (like abuse, accidents, loss of loved ones etc)?
Trauma and Adverse Experiences.expected_answer:
Experienced Trauma: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Type, Timeframe, Severity]

Trauma and Adverse Experiences.question: How have these experiences impacted you emotionally?
Trauma and Adverse Experiences.expected_answer: Emotional Impact: [Specific Emotions, Duration/Frequency, Triggers, Functional Impact]

Substance Use and Addiction.question: Do you use any substances such as alcohol, drugs etc? If so then how frequently and in what amount?
Substance Use and Addiction.expected_answer:
Substance Use: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Specific Substance, Frequency, Triggers, Functional Impact, Current Status]

Substance Use and Addiction.question: Do you struggle with addiction or compulsive behaviors (like gambling, porn etc)?
Substance Use and Addiction.expected_answer:
Struggle with Addiction/Compulsive Behaviors: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Specific Addiction, Frequency, Triggers, Functional Impact, Current Status]

Health and Lifestyle.question: How do you take care of your physical and emotional health?
Health and Lifestyle.expected_answer: Physical & Emotional Health Care: [User's Specific Practices]

Health and Lifestyle.question: How would you describe your sleep patterns and food habits?
Health and Lifestyle.expected_answer:
Sleep Patterns & Food Habits:
Frequency of Meals: [User's Description]
Quality of Meals: [Healthy/Unhealthy]
Frequency of Eating Out: [User's Description]
Sleep Duration: [User's Average Sleep Hours]
Sleep Pattern: [Regular/Irregular]
Time of Sleep: [User's Sleep Schedule]

Health and Lifestyle.question: What activities do you enjoy that help you relax or feel fulfilled?
Health and Lifestyle.expected_answer: Relaxation & Fulfillment Activities: [Specific Activities, Frequency, Alone/Involving Others]

Coping Mechanisms.question: What coping strategies do you currently use to manage stress or difficult emotions?
Coping Mechanisms.expected_answer:
Coping Strategies: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Specific Strategies, When Used, Frequency]

Relationships and Social Support.question: How would you describe your relationships with family and friends?
Relationships and Social Support.expected_answer:
Relationship with Family & Friends:
Closeness with Family: [1-10]
Closeness with Friends: [1-10]

Relationships and Social Support.question: Do you feel supported in your personal and professional life?
Relationships and Social Support.expected_answer:
Feeling Supported in Personal & Professional Life:
Personal Life Support: [1-10]
Professional Life Support: [1-10]

Relationships and Social Support.question: Who do you turn to for comfort and support?
Relationships and Social Support.expected_answer: Emotional Support System: [Identified People/Systems, Likelihood of Seeking Support]

Self-Perception.question: How do you feel about yourself overall? Do you struggle with self esteem issues? Is there any aspect of yourself that you find really difficult to accept?

Medical and Medication History.question: Do you have any significant medical conditions?
Medical and Medication History.expected_answer:
Significant Medical Conditions: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Condition, Timeline, Daily Impact]

Medical and Medication History.question: Are you currently taking any medications? If so, what are they?
Medical and Medication History.expected_answer:
Current Medications: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Medication Names, Dosage, Frequency, Effectiveness]

Personal Values and Meaning.question: Do you feel like your life has meaning and purpose? If not, what is missing?
Personal Values and Meaning.expected_answer:
Sense of Meaning & Purpose: [Yes/No]
If No: [What is Missing]

Risk to Self / others.question: Have you had any prior attempts of suicide or ideas? If in the past, then how do you feel about it in the present?
Risk to Self / others.expected_answer:
History of Suicide Attempts/Thoughts: [Yes/No/Unclear]
If Yes: [Past & Present Feelings]

Risk to Self / others.question: Have you had any prior aggression or destruction or any sort of harmful experiences towards others?
Risk to Self / others.expected_answer: History of Aggression or Harm to Others: [Yes/No/Unclear]

Mental Status Examination.question: How has your mood been recently?
Do you feel difficulty in focusing and completing tasks / daily activities?
Have you had hallucinations recently / before?
What activities do you find yourself doing without realising? (Compulsive habits such as plucking of hairs, scarping off skin, biting nails).
Mental Status Examination.expected_answer:
Compulsive Habits: [Yes/No]
If Yes: [Specific Habit & Frequency]
